moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Gust
moves.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Powder
moves.description: The user covers the target in a powder that explodes and damages the target if it uses a Fire-type move.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

moves.name: Struggle Bug
moves.description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.description: The user steals the target's energy with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Aromatherapy
moves.description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user's party.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Quiver Dance
moves.description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. It boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Hurricane
moves.description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Powder
moves.description: The user covers the target in a powder that explodes and damages the target if it uses a Fire-type move.
